meta_description.title: Halo: Combat Evolved - GameSpot
meta_description.text: Not only is this easily the best of the Xbox launch games, but it's easily one of the best shooters ever, on any platform.

people_also_ask.question: Why is Halo 1 called Combat Evolved?
people_also_ask.heading: After Bungie refused to change the Halo name to appease marketing research teams, the subtitle "Combat Evolved" was added to make it more descriptive and compete better with other military-themed games.
people_also_ask.title: Halo: Combat Evolved - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.question: Is Halo combat evolved the same as Halo 1?
people_also_ask.heading: Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary and the original, Halo: Combat Evolved, are identical in gameplay and plot. The game is a first-person shooter with portions of vehicular combat taking place from a third-person perspective.
people_also_ask.title: Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.question: Can you just buy Halo Combat Evolved?
people_also_ask.heading: Possible to buy *only* "Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary"? ... [Halo: Combat Evolved] is available as part of the Xbox Game Pass for PC, or purchasable as part of Master Chief Collection on the Microsoft Store and Steam for $39.99. If you only want Halo: CE Anniversary, you can buy that individually for $9.99.05-Mar-2020
people_also_ask.title: Possible to buy *only* "Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary"?

people_also_ask.question: Is Halo Combat Evolved on PC?
people_also_ask.heading: Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary surprise launched Tuesday on Windows PC via Steam, Microsoft Store, and Xbox Game Pass for PC. ... It's available as part of the Xbox Game Pass for PC, or purchasable as part of Master Chief Collection on the Microsoft Store and Steam for $39.99.03-Mar-2020

knowledge_panel.description: halo: combat evolved is a 2001 first-person shooter game developed by bungie and published by microsoft game studios. it was released as a launch game for microsoft's xbox video game console on november 15, 2001. microsoft released versions of the game for windows and mac os x in 2003. wikipedia
